# Trial level data

```{r}

# get data and do exclusions

exp_1_trial_level <- read.csv("../../experiment 1/data/processed/trial_level_ia_amp_positive_negative_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 1,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Generic valence") %>%
  filter(complete_data == TRUE & 
           self_exclusion_1 == "Yes, use my data")

exp_2_trial_level <- read.csv("../../experiment 2/data/processed/trial_level_ia_amp_positive_negative_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 2,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Generic valence") %>%
  filter(complete_data == TRUE & 
           self_exclusion_1 == "Yes, use my data")

exp_3_trial_level <- read.csv("../../experiment 3/data/processed/trial_level_ia_amp_positive_negative_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 3,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Generic valence") %>%
  filter(complete_data == TRUE & 
           self_exclusion_1 == "Yes, use my data" &
           party == "democrat")

exp_4_trial_level <- read.csv("../../experiment 4/data/processed/trial_level_ia_amp_positive_negative_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 4,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Generic valence") %>%
  filter(complete_data == TRUE & 
           self_exclusion_1 == "Yes, use my data" &
           party %in% c("democrat", "republican"))

exp_4_trial_level_politics <- read.csv("../../experiment 4/data/processed/trial_level_ia_amp_obama_trump_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 4,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Politics") %>%
  filter(complete_data == TRUE & 
           self_exclusion_1 == "Yes, use my data" &
           party %in% c("democrat", "republican"))

exp_5_trial_level <- read.csv("../../experiment 5/data/processed/trial_level_ia_amp_positive_negative_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 5,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Generic valence") %>%
  filter(complete_data == TRUE & 
           self_exclusion_1 == "Yes, use my data")

exp_6_trial_level <- read.csv("../../experiment 6/data/processed/trial_level_ia_amp_positive_negative_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 6,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Generic valence") %>%
  filter(complete_data == TRUE & 
           self_exclusion_1 == "Yes, use my data")

exp_7_trial_level <- read.csv("../../experiment 7/data/processed/trial_level_ia_amp_positive_negative_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 7,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Generic valence") %>%
  filter(complete_data == TRUE & 
           self_exclusion_1 == "Yes, use my data")

data_combined_trial_level_data <- bind_rows(exp_1_trial_level, 
                                            exp_2_trial_level,
                                            exp_3_trial_level,
                                            exp_4_trial_level,
                                            exp_4_trial_level_politics,
                                            exp_5_trial_level,
                                            exp_6_trial_level,
                                            exp_7_trial_level) %>%
  mutate(unique_id = paste(experiment, subject, sep = "_"),
         prime_type = dplyr::recode(prime_type,
                                    "prime_type_B" = "Positive",
                                    "prime_type_A" = "Negative"),
         prime_type = fct_relevel(prime_type,
                                  "Negative",
                                  "Positive")) %>%
  dplyr::select(-subject)

# write to disk 
write_csv(data_combined_trial_level_data, "data_combined_trial_level.csv")

```

# Participant level data

```{r}

exp_1 <- read.csv("../../experiment 1/data/processed/processed_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 1,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Generic valence",
         age = as.numeric(age)) %>%
  dplyr::rename(IA_AMP_effect = IA_AMP_effect_positive_negative)

exp_2 <- read.csv("../../experiment 2/data/processed/processed_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 2,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Generic valence",
         AMP_domain = "Generic valence",
         age = as.numeric(age)) %>%
  dplyr::rename(IA_AMP_effect = IA_AMP_effect_positive_negative,
                AMP_effect = AMP_effect_positive_negative)

exp_3 <- read.csv("../../experiment 3/data/processed/processed_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 3,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Generic valence",
         AMP_domain = "Politics",
         age = as.numeric(age)) %>%
  filter(complete_data == TRUE & 
           self_exclusion_1 == "Yes, use my data" &
           party == "democrat") %>%
  dplyr::rename(IA_AMP_effect = IA_AMP_effect_positive_negative,
                AMP_effect = AMP_effect_obama_trump)

exp_4 <- read.csv("../../experiment 4/data/processed/processed_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 4,
         influence_rate = influence_rate_positive_negative,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Generic valence",
         age = as.numeric(age)) %>%
  filter(party %in% c("democrat", "republican")) %>%
  select(-IA_AMP_effect_obama_trump, -influence_rate_obama_trump) %>%
  dplyr::rename(IA_AMP_effect = IA_AMP_effect_positive_negative)

exp_4_politics <- read.csv("../../experiment 4/data/processed/processed_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 4,
         influence_rate = influence_rate_obama_trump,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Politics",
         age = as.numeric(age)) %>%
  filter(party %in% c("democrat", "republican")) %>%
  dplyr::select(-IA_AMP_effect_positive_negative, -influence_rate_positive_negative) %>%
  dplyr::rename(IA_AMP_effect = IA_AMP_effect_obama_trump) 
  
exp_5 <- read.csv("../../experiment 5/data/processed/processed_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 5,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Generic valence",
         AMP_domain = "Generic valence",
         age = as.numeric(age)) %>%
  dplyr::rename(IA_AMP_effect = IA_AMP_effect_positive_negative,
                AMP_effect = AMP_effect_positive_negative) 

exp_6 <- read.csv("../../experiment 6/data/processed/processed_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 6,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Generic valence",
         AMP_domain = "Generic valence",
         age = as.numeric(age)) %>%
  dplyr::rename(IA_AMP_effect = IA_AMP_effect_positive_negative,
                AMP_effect = AMP_effect_positive_negative) 

exp_7 <- read.csv("../../experiment 7/data/processed/processed_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(experiment = 7,
         IA_AMP_domain = "Generic valence",
         AMP_domain = "Generic valence",
         age = as.numeric(age)) %>%
  dplyr::rename(IA_AMP_effect = IA_AMP_effect_positive_negative,
                AMP_effect = AMP_effect_positive_negative)

data_combined_participant_level_temp <- 
  bind_rows(exp_1, 
            exp_2, 
            exp_3, 
            exp_4, 
            exp_4_politics, 
            exp_5,
            exp_6,
            exp_7) %>%
  dplyr::select(sort(names(.))) %>%
  filter(complete_data == TRUE & 
           self_exclusion_1 == "Yes, use my data") %>%
  mutate(unique_id = paste(experiment, subject, sep = "_"),
         age = as.numeric(age),
         gender = case_when(str_detect(tolower(gender), "f") ~ "female",
                            str_detect(tolower(gender), "w") ~ "female",
                            str_detect(tolower(gender), "m") ~ "male",
                            TRUE ~ "other"),
         
         awareness = as.numeric(awareness),
         influence_general = as.numeric(influence_general),
         intentionality = as.numeric(intentionality),
         unintentionality = as.numeric(unintentionality)) %>%
  dplyr::select(unique_id, experiment, 
                age, gender, party, politics, 
                AMP_domain, AMP_effect,
                IA_AMP_domain, IA_AMP_effect,
                influence_rate, influence_general)

# compute IA-AMP effect for influenced vs non influened trials
data_IA_AMP_effects_by_influence <- data_combined_trial_level_data %>%
  group_by(experiment, IA_AMP_domain, unique_id, influenced, prime_type) %>%
  dplyr::summarize(amp_effect = mean(rating)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  spread(prime_type, amp_effect) %>%
  mutate(IA_AMP_effect_positive_negative = round(Positive - Negative, 2)) %>%
  select(experiment, IA_AMP_domain, unique_id, influenced, IA_AMP_effect_positive_negative) %>%
  spread(influenced, IA_AMP_effect_positive_negative) %>%
  dplyr::rename(IA_AMP_uninfluenced_effect = `0`,
                IA_AMP_influenced_effect = `1`)

# combine
data_combined_participant_level <- data_combined_participant_level_temp %>%
  left_join(data_IA_AMP_effects_by_influence, by = c("experiment", "unique_id", "IA_AMP_domain"))

# write to disk 
write_csv(data_combined_participant_level, "data_combined_participant_level.csv")

```
